page.title: 07Transport In Norton Area.
page.content: There are quite a few minor roads in our area, but most of the land is fields. The most important road junction is at the roundabout near Sutton Maddock Garage. Here the B4379, B4176 and A442 roads meet. They lead to Shifnal, Dudley, Bridgnorth and Telford( and the motorway). The A442 is the busiest road, running from north to south, and connecting Whitchurch to Kidderminster. Different means of transport on the roads are cars, vans, lorries, motor cycles, bicycles,coaches, buses,Landrovers, tractors,fire engines, ambulances,police cars and jeeps. At Norton there is a Crossing Patrol Warden and flashing crossing lights for school children to cross the A442 at lunch time.
